body:
Would you change your name when name changes are supported in Minecraft, and if so what would you change it too? I would definitely change my name, but I'm not sure what I would change it too.

Edit: Old name is americangirl2304
body_tagged:
Would you change your name when name changes are supported in Minecraft, and if so what would you change it too? I would definitely change my name, but I'm not sure what I would change it too.

Edit: Old name is americangirl2304
title: IGN Changes - Would you change yours?

replies.body:
That's an epic username — completely original, too. I've never heard anything like it; where'd you get your inspiration for it? I'm envious.

As for myself, I have three accounts... this one's name is going to my second account so I can change this and the third one. So much capriciousness... frenetic, renegade... "FreneticRenegade"? Nah, I dunno...

replies.body:
I'm not sure. I'm considering spelling "cinnamon" right in my name, though currently it gives me a sort of nostalgic feeling that brings back memories of earlier games that I've played.
I've also considered things like "CinnamonCroc" or just "Croc" or "Cin," but I still like my username as it is. It has a nice roll on the tongue (or maybe it's just me x3) and it's sort of a random thing. Like, what's a "cinnamon croc?"

Idk, I think I'm arguing over this myself too much xD
